name: Constellation (PiarcoClub)
description:
Constellation

A puzzle action game with an abstract point of view. Inspired by the Georgia O'Keefe painting 'Black Abstract'.  

Developed for the 'Gaming Like It's 1927' game jam.

---

Collect all the flags ('+') to complete each level.

----

Controls: 

 Left / Right Analog Stick  | Mouse :  Rotation Control

Right Trigger Button | A Button : Boost

Left Trigger Button | Space Bar  : Rotation Rest

*For the best experience use a gamepad. 

**Tip: When using a mouse move slowly.
